name: Pair'O'Penguins
text: If you control a "Penguin" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn, you can discard 1 "Penguin" monster; Special Summon a "Penguin" monster from your Deck with the same level as that monster but a different name in face-up or face-down defense position. If this card is flipped face up, you can Special Summon 1 "Penguin" Xyz monster from your Extra Deck and attach this card to it as a material
